sentence.Network_en: The gens attempted to uproot the entire conjugal system of the period by its direct action.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from Latin conjugalis, from conjux, conjug- 'spouse', from con- 'together'+ jugum 'a yoke'

entry.tran: 婚姻的;夫妻关系的；(尤指）性关系的
entry.def: Conjugal means relating to marriage and the relationship between a husband and wife, especially their sexual relationship.

example.ex: ...a man deprived of his conjugal rights.
example.tran: 被剥夺了夫妻权的男子

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to marriage or to the relationship between a wife and husband;

auth_sentence.content: The hearing of such conjugal faithfulness will be Musick to all chaste ears.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The hearing of such conjugal faithfulness will be Musick to all chaste ears.

auth_sentence.content: To prefer perverse and unnatural pleasures to the more banal fulfillments of conjugal love.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: To prefer perverse and unnatural pleasures to the more banal fulfillments of conjugal love.

auth_sentence.content: Conjugal visits are allowed four times a year and some women with small children can keep their infants with them.

stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+jug牛轭+al……的→共同在轭下
con共同+jug牛轭+ate表动词→共同在轭下[结合]
sub在下面+jug牛轭+ate表动词→套上牛轭→镇压
